tool_description: Generates interactive preview of assembled surveys showing question flow, logic behavior, and visual appearance before deployment.

preview_mode.description: Preview mode: full_survey, question_flow, logic_only, or visual_only

test_device.description: Device type for preview: desktop, tablet, or mobile

error_messages: Survey not found: The specified survey_id does not exist
Survey not assembled: Cannot preview survey that hasn't been assembled
Invalid preview mode: Must be one of [full_survey, question_flow, logic_only, visual_only]
Invalid device type: Must be one of [desktop, tablet, mobile]
Preview generation failed: Unable to generate preview due to survey configuration errors
usage: Provide survey_id and optionally set preview_mode, simulate_responses, and test_device. Returns comprehensive preview information showing how the survey will appear and behave for respondents.

question_flow.description: Ordered list of questions as they appear in the survey

logic_rules_active.description: Number of active logic rules in the survey
